entries.name: console_mode       → modeclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a data represents the current console mode.

entries.name: console_mode = modeclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets the console mode to mode.

entries.name: echo = flagclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Enables/disables echo back. On some platforms, all combinations of this flags and raw/cooked mode may not be valid.

entries.name: echo?       → true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if echo back is enabled.

entries.name: getch(min: nil, time: nil, intr: nil) → charclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Reads and returns a character in raw mode.

entries.name: getpass(prompt=nil)       → stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Reads and returns a line without echo back. Prints prompt unless it is nil.

entries.name: ioflushclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Flushes input and output buffers in kernel.

entries.name: noecho {|io| }click to toggle source
entries.desc: Yields self with disabling echo back.

entries.name: raw(min: nil, time: nil, intr: nil) {|io| }click to toggle source
entries.desc: Yields self within raw mode, and returns the result of the block.

entries.name: raw!(min: nil, time: nil, intr: nil) → ioclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Enables raw mode, and returns io.

entries.name: winsize = [rows, columns]click to toggle source
entries.desc: Tries to set console size.  The effect depends on the platform and the running environment.
